item.title: MacOS Python2.7->3.7
item.description:
已经有两位朋友来跟我说用homebrew了，dbq我真的智障🤦🏻‍♀️ brew install python3就好啦！

以防万一还是没动系统自带的2.7

  1. 官网下3.7.4 https://www.python.org/downloads/

  2. open ~/.bash_profile加几行代码

    export PATH=$PATH:/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.7/bin:
alias python="/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.7/bin/python3.7"
alias python2='/usr/bin/python2.7'

  3. pip也记得在bash_profile里加一下

    alias pip='/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.7/bin/pip3.7'

  4. source ~/.bash_profile
